data.title: GIYANI Postal Code (LP)
data.meta_description: Giyani Postcode - Get the postal code for Giyani (LP) in Mopani and search for other postcodes in Limpopo - Qpzm
data.text:
Giyani is a suburb of Mopani, Limpopo with a postal code. It is about 153 kms north-northeast of LP's capital city of Polokwane.

Locations near Giyani LP Gakgapane, Gazankulu, Giyani East, Hatshama, Khomanani, Kuranta, Majosi, Makhosha, Makosha, Masia, Masingita, Mokwathi, Nkomo, Nkuri, Nsavulani, Nwamankena, Nwamanungu, Pipa, Sambo, Savulani, Shimange, Shiviti, Vongani, Vuyani, Xikhumba
